name: NoHo
description: NoHo is a neighborhood in New York City, New York with a population of 2,809. NoHo is in New York County and is one of the best places to live in New York. Living in NoHo offers residents a dense urban feel and most residents rent their homes. In NoHo there are a lot of bars, restaurants, coffee shops, and parks. Many young professionals live in NoHo and residents tend to be liberal. The public schools in NoHo are above average.
